name: Urban Outbreak
description:
Your city has gone into lock-down due to the COVID-19 virus being spread amongst the community. 

Each day, the rules change as to which shops you can visit, how many people are allowed inside, and when the curfew is. 

While managing these lock-down conditions, you must still get on with your day-to-day life: take your kids to after school activities, get the groceries, and go to work. 

Be careful! If the authorities find out that you broke the rules, or if you get infected with COVID-19, the game is over! 

 You have 30 days to get as many jobs done as you can! GO!!
